name: ToweReturn (noahkuhn)
description:
RAGTAG MISFITS PRESENTS...

TOWERETURN

You've been captured and thrown into a tower, but it gets even worse-- your dog has been captured too! Find your way through the floors of the tower and return from whence you came to free yourself (and, more importantly, your dog).

Made in 36 hours for UT Game Jam 2019.
